workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of cardio (treadmill, bike) to get your heart rate up and loosen your muscles.

workouts.name: Barbell Bench Press
workouts.description: A classic upper body exercise that targets your chest, shoulders, and triceps. Lie on a flat bench and grip the barbell with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.

workouts.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
workouts.description: Targets the upper chest muscles. Sit on an incline bench and hold a dumbbell in each hand, then press the dumbbells upwards towards the ceiling.

workouts.name: Cable Flyes
workouts.description: Targets the chest muscles. Stand facing a cable machine with the cable at chest height, then press the cable out to the sides until your arms are fully extended.

workouts.name: Triceps Pushdowns
workouts.description: Targets the triceps. Hold a barbell or rope attachment with your hands shoulder-width apart, then extend your arms fully and lower the weight back down to the starting position.

workouts.name: Bicep Curls
workouts.description: Targets the biceps. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, then curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders.

workouts.name: Cool-down
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of stretching to help your body recover from the workout.

workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of cardio (treadmill, bike) to get your heart rate up and loosen your muscles.

workouts.name: Pull-ups
workouts.description: A classic upper body exercise that targets your back, shoulders, and arms. Hang from a pull-up bar with your hands shoulder-width apart, then pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar.

workouts.name: Barbell Rows
workouts.description: Targets the back muscles. Hold a barbell with your hands shoulder-width apart, then bend your knees slightly and lean forward at the hips.

workouts.name: Lat Pulldowns
workouts.description: Targets the latissimus dorsi muscles. Sit at a lat pulldown machine with your knees securely under the knee pad, then pull the bar down towards your chest.

workouts.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
workouts.description: Targets the shoulder muscles. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, then press the dumbbells straight up over your head.

workouts.name: Cool-down
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of stretching to help your body recover from the workout.

workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of cardio (treadmill, bike) to get your heart rate up and loosen your muscles.

workouts.name: Squats
workouts.description: A compound exercise that targets your legs, glutes, and core. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, then lower your body down until your thighs are parallel to the ground.

workouts.name: Leg Press
workouts.description: Targets the legs. Sit at a leg press machine with your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform, then push the platform away from you.

workouts.name: Lunges
workouts.description: Targets the legs. Stand with your feet together, then take a large step forward with one foot and lower your body down until your back knee is almost touching the ground.

workouts.name: Calf Raises
workouts.description: Targets the calf muscles. Stand on a step or platform, then raise up onto your tiptoes and lower back down.

workouts.name: Cool-down
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of stretching to help your body recover from the workout.

workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of cardio (treadmill, bike) to get your heart rate up and loosen your muscles.

workouts.name: Deadlifts
workouts.description: A compound exercise that targets your back, legs, and core. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, then bend down and grab a barbell or dumbbells with your hands shoulder-width apart.

workouts.name: Bent-Over Barbell Rows
workouts.description: Targets the back muscles. Hold a barbell with your hands shoulder-width apart, then bend your knees slightly and lean forward at the hips.

workouts.name: Lat Pulldowns
workouts.description: Targets the latissimus dorsi muscles. Sit at a lat pulldown machine with your knees securely under the knee pad, then pull the bar down towards your chest.

workouts.name: Tricep Dips
workouts.description: Targets the triceps. Sit on the edge of a bench or chair, then place your hands next to your hips and lower your body down by bending your elbows.

workouts.name: Cool-down
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of stretching to help your body recover from the workout.

workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of cardio (treadmill, bike) to get your heart rate up and loosen your muscles.

workouts.name: Shoulder Press
workouts.description: Targets the shoulder muscles. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, then press the dumbbells straight up over your head.

workouts.name: Lateral Raises
workouts.description: Targets the shoulder muscles. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, then raise the dumbbells out to the sides until they are at shoulder height.

workouts.name: Front Raises
workouts.description: Targets the shoulder muscles. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, then raise the dumbbells forward and up until they are at shoulder height.

workouts.name: Bicep Curls
workouts.description: Targets the biceps. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, then curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders.

workouts.name: Cool-down
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of stretching to help your body recover from the workout.

workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of cardio (treadmill, bike) to get your heart rate up and loosen your muscles.

workouts.name: Calf Raises
workouts.description: Targets the calf muscles. Stand on a step or platform, then raise up onto your tiptoes and lower back down.

workouts.name: Seated Leg Curls
workouts.description: Targets the hamstrings. Sit at a seated leg curl machine with your legs hanging off the edge of the bench, then curl your legs up towards your glutes.

workouts.name: Glute Bridges
workouts.description: Targets the glutes. Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground, then lift your hips up towards the ceiling.

workouts.name: Russian Twists
workouts.description: Targets the obliques. Sit on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat, then twist your torso from side to side.

workouts.name: Cool-down
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of stretching to help your body recover from the workout.

workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of cardio (treadmill, bike) to get your heart rate up and loosen your muscles.

workouts.name: Burpees
workouts.description: A full-body exercise that targets your arms, legs, and core. Start in a standing position, then drop down into a squat position and place your hands on the ground.

workouts.name: Mountain Climbers
workouts.description: A high-intensity exercise that targets your core and legs. Start in a plank position, then bring one knee up towards your chest and quickly switch to the other knee.

workouts.name: Plank
workouts.description: Targets the core muscles. Start in a plank position, then hold for 30-60 seconds.

workouts.name: Side Plank
workouts.description: Targets the obliques. Lie on your side with your feet stacked and hands under your shoulders, then lift your hips up towards the ceiling.

workouts.name: Cool-down
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of stretching to help your body recover from the workout.
